name: asLib
description: An Agent-Skills (i.e. Entity-Attribute) general purpose library.

scripts.prepublish: npm test && rm -f as-lib.js as-lib.min.js as-lib.zip && uglifyjs src/asLib.js -b indent-level=2 -o as-lib.js && bin/uglify as-lib.js > as-lib.min.js && chmod a-w as-lib.js as-lib.min.js && zip as-lib.zip LICENSE as-lib.js as-lib.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git tag -am "Release $VERSION." ${VERSION} && git push --tags
